content:
Udayonaam naathhaa!-ninshreshdhathayekkeertthippaan
Madiyaam nidrayil ni nnenneyezhunnelppikkaname

Orunaallum nidra-ykkamaraatthoraameerayarpol
Ninne snehanidhe! Keertthippaan nyaanezhunnettu.

Ortthen nyaaniravil-vandyam shuddham thirunaamam
Ninne snehanidhe! Keertthippaan nyaanezhunnettu.

Shemavoonbhavanatthil-paapiniyude pizhapokkiyapol
Udayonaam naathhaa!En pizhayum pokkeedaname.

Kaanaaneerenmaar-kezhumpoll manyanaadaam
Than kaikallil ninne yaaghoshippoo, sthuthi naathhaa!

Padavikallerum parishuddha-
Kkentorunaamam nyaan nalkum
/tdaivatthin maathaa-vathbhutha sampoornna
Aamgyatthaalilokatthe
Elpponeyelkkum svargam

Bhoopathi daavidinu suthayaay-jaatham cheythollaam
Mariyaamaakum divyarathham-rakshakaneyenti

Kartthaave! Sthuthiyennevam vaazhtthippaadeedum
Mariyaamaakum rathhamallo-paaram mahaneeyam
Haale… thalpraarththhana sharanam.

Vaayum naavum mozhiyumezhum-maanavarellaarum
Bhaagyam bhaagyaarhathayulllla mariyaminekatte
Parithoshatthin-nalkkathirundaaya
Vaazhvin vayalaam-mariyaam bhaagyavathi
Muttukallaam chakrangallezhum theraayttheernnulakin
Rakshakanetthannudaratthil ettoll bhaagyavathi
Haale... Thalpraarththhana sharanam.

Dhanye! Nin praarththhanamevatte nyangallodonni
Charththhana kettittekeedatte punyam naathhan

Sambhaashippaanenne villichu paavana kanya
Maanyatha kaappaanaashubha charitham shraddhicheedaam
Randaam vaanin madiyil paartthaan svargaadheeshan
Bhoomiyilampodandhatha neekkaanavalliludichaan

Paavappettoll daivasuthan than maathaavaayi
Durbalalokam rakshithamaakaan sampattheki
Svargapithaavin nikshepatthaalavallaam nauka
Paazhoolakatthe aishvaryatthin bhaajanamaakki.

Ompathumaasam ninneyettoll than praarththhanayaal
Daivaathmajane! Kopatthin dandaazhivaakkenam.

Mannithile mannanmaare
Vennor ningall veeranmaar
Moorchayezhum vaallkoo-rampivayaalalla
Veeryam nirayum sleebaayaal
Paashaandathaye tholppichaar

Darshaka padavikkuravidamaam-moshaye naamorppoo
Shleehaganatthin thalayaallaam-sheemoneyumathupol
/tneethipriyare-orppaan romaakkaar
/tkkezhuthiya shilppi-paulosineyortthu
Poornnamanassodu daivatthe yavaraaraadhichu
Thal praarththhanayaal nammudemel-krpayundaakatte.
/thaale........... Thalpraarththhana sharanam.

Sathyolghoshaka yohannaan-eskeppaanosu
Ulkrshdan thevodoros-geevarugeesu sahadaa
/tshreshdhabhadanmaar-sargeesu baakkosum
/tmaar kuriyaakkos-maathaa yoolitthi
Ezhaathmajarodu vaazhviyalum-maathaavaam shani
Naalppathu nirmmala sahadenmaar sveekrthanaam thommaa
/thaale................ Thal praarththhana sharanam.

Ishdanmaar than praarththhanayaal
Kartthaave! Krpa cheyyaname
Thalpraarththhanayaal yaachanayaal
Anpaathmaakkallilundaaka.

Nin vrtthaantam roohaayaal
Chonnoraam nibi shleehanmaar
snehaal mrtharaam sahadenmaar
praarththhikkum krpacheyyenam

Kartthaavinnishdam cheythaar
Nirmmalare! Praarththhicheeduvin
nyangallil ninnum neengeedaan
kopatthinnadiyum dandum

Ishdanmaar than praarththhanayaal
Kartthaave! Krpa cheyyaname
Thalpraarththhanayaal yaachanayaal
Anpaathmaakkallilundaaka.

Pinvaathikkalirunnevam
Sheemon paaram kenothi
Guruve! Nyaan shishyan-vaathil thurannaalum
Svargatthaakkol kaivitten
paarum vaanum kezhunnu.

Pethgomo-vaazhtthum ninne daasanmaar haaleluyyaa
Daivaathmajane naamiravil sthothram cheyyenam.
Kartthaavu varunnennaravam-raathriyilundaakum
/tneethipriyarum nibishleehanmaarum
/tsahadenmaarum vannidumethirelppaan
Santoshatthin manavarayil sakalarumangeri-
Ttuyirum raajyamathum nedi-sthuthipaadum noonam.
/thaale...... Kartthaave! Sthothram

Ezhunnettaanannaduraavil-daaveedudayon than
Aashcharyam nirayum nyaaya-ttheerppukalle vaazhtthaan
/tmeethe kandaan-ambaravirivingkal
/tbhramanam cheyyum thejogollangall
Engum paramasamaadhaanam-paaril kandappoll
Daaveedathbhuthaparathantran-kartthaave! Ninne
/tsthuthiyaal keertthichu

Vaanavar thanneeshaa-maanavar thangathiye
Ee shushrooshayeye-ttaardratha thonnenam.

Maarthommaathan perunnaalli-nnenne villichudayon
Poyaalovina pokaanyaal-bheethiyenikkerum
/tpoyennaalen-paapangalleyorkkum
/thaa! Pokaaykil nyaan verumanyanthaan
Daivasuthante vilaavathile ninamen kadamellaam
Veettum, kartthaave! Sthuthiyennaarppodu nyaan paadum
/thaale.......... Thal praarththhana sharanam.

Bhaagyam thirusabha maarthommaa!-nerunnangeykkaayu
Kartthaavarulliyathaam bhaagyam-ningkalananyallo
/tpaazhoolakatthe-vittihamashihaathan
/tsnehatthe kaikkondon nee dhanyan
Svargatthil shaashvatha jeevan-vannavakaashikke-
Nnudayonarullum naadam nee-kellkkumpoll dhanyan
/thaale..............Nin praarththhana sharanam.

Eeshaa! Naathhaa! Varika thunappaan villikoottunnu
Praarththhana kettittaathmaakkallmel krpa cheyyenam.

Daivatthin vanvismayacharitham keertthicheedaan
Mannan daaveedannaduraavil chelodunarnnaan
Daaveedin sangkeertthanamaathmaprerithanaayi
Bodhajnyaanee! Yinnaduraavil paaduka neeyum

Nee pakal naathhaa! Nyaanathinaale shobhikkenam
Ninkrpa kaanaanennude mizhikallkkekuka deepthi
Laukikamaargam kashdappaadaal sangkadapoornnam
Nee pakalallo ninnil nadapponidarukayilla.

Devaa! Devaa! Uttharamarullikkaarunyam che-
Thekeedenam manujaathmaakkallkkanuthaapam nee
